title: Police hunt suspects in attempted killing of Osman Hadi
body: Police are searching for those involved in the attempted killing of Sharif Osman Hadi, an independent parliamentary aspirant for Dhaka-8 and spokesperson for Inqilab Moncho. "We are searching for the prime suspect. Hopefully, we will be able to nab him. We are seeking public cooperation," Dhaka Metropolitan Police (DMP) Commissioner Sheikh Md Sazzat Ali told reporters today. He made the remarks after addressing the annual general meeting of the Retired Police Officers' Welfare Association at Rajarbagh in Dhaka. The DMP commissioner said he was optimistic that those responsible for the attempted assassination would soon be brought to justice. Asked whether the attack had left aspiring candidates for the upcoming national election feeling insecure, he said law enforcement agencies were taking measures to ensure the safety of all candidates.
